name: Office Simulator - Physics Build
description:
A fully interactable physics build for my game, Office Simulator. EVERYTHING is interactable, even the windows ;)

Controls

  • Mouse to look
  • WASD to move
  • E to pick up an object (if it can be picked up, green icon)
  • Hold E to throw held item
  • R to reset all objects and level
  • M to change mouse sensitivity

Some slight graphics compression happens on the monitor screens because of the WebGL build restrictions. On the desktop downloadable below, this graphic glitch does not exist.
